description: Confederacy counteroffenseives in Virginia and the West stop a forthcoming Union victory
comment: Start date is the start of the Seven Days Battles.

description: Union victories and Antietam and Perryville stop Confederate inviation of the North and ends possible European intervention
comment: Start date is the date of the Battle of Antietam

description: Union victories at Gettysburg, Vicksburg and Chattanooga
comment: Start date is start of the Battle of Gettysburg

description: Confederate victories increased war fatigue in the Union.
comment: Start date is the start the Battle of the Wilderness, and start of the overland campaign.

description: Union capture of Atlanta and destruction of Jubal Early's army in Virginia
comment: Start date is the date of the capture of Atlanta.
